labels.label:
Table DDL:
CREATE TABLE public.testlab_1 ( id serial4 NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, int_field int4 NULL, str_field varchar NULL, ts_field timestamp NULL, double_field decimal NULL, created_at timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ); ALTER TABLE public.testlab_1 REPLICA IDENTITY FULL;

entry.value: update testlab_1 set int_field = ${random():mod(99999999):plus(1)} where id in (SELECT id FROM testlab_1 ORDER BY RANDOM() limit 1)
update testlab_1 set double_field = ${math("random")} where id in (SELECT id FROM testlab_1 ORDER BY RANDOM() limit 1)
delete from testlab_1 where id in (SELECT id FROM testlab_1 ORDER BY RANDOM() limit 1)
update testlab_1 set str_field = '${UUID():repeat(5,50)}' where id in (SELECT id FROM testlab_1 ORDER BY RANDOM() limit 1)

update testlab_1 set ts_field = '${random():mod(23):plus(2000)}-${random():mod(12):plus(1)}-${random():mod(28):plus(1)} ${random():mod(23)}:${random():mod(60)}:${random():mod(60)}.${random():mod(1000)}' where id in (SELECT id FROM testlab_1 ORDER BY RANDOM() limit 1)
